Name: Genki II Chapter 19 Vocabulary

Set.中学生・ちゅうがくせい: junior high school student/middle school student

Set.仲がいい・なかがいい: be on good terms/be on close terms/get along well

Set.いらっしゃる: x/honorific expression for いく, くる, and いる

Set.召し上がる・めしあがる: x/honorific expression for たべる and のむ

Set.引っ越す・ひっこす: to move (to another place to live)/to move

Set.もてる／モテる: to be popular (in terms of romantic interest)/to be popular

Set.ごちそう（する）: to treat (to a meal)/to invite (to a meal)/to treat/to invite

Set.塩嶺する・えんりょう（する）: to hold back for the time being/to refrain

Set.招待（する）・しょうたい（する）: to invite (someone to an event or place)/to invite

Set.～名様・～めいさま: x/party of ... people/party of people/counter for customers/customers/party

Notes:
KanjiMode: Before
敬語が嫌い　＞：（
You can enter x for all of the honorific words, counters, and phrases, to speed up review times.
